section_four.title: Stories
section_four.story_one_message: “I love the opportunity to share my life, children can learn from our experiences and keep them in their memories.”
section_four.story_two_message: “It's gratifying to know that my story can inspire and teach new generations. I hope my life experiences help them build a better future.”
section_four.story_three_message: “Sharing my experiences is like leaving a legacy. I want young people to learn from our stories and carry them with them as they grow.”

section_five.main_message: The stories will be categorized by content and age and can be assigned to student groups. You will be able to track their status and allow students to communicate.

section_six.message_part_three: Help us create a better world.

project.message_part_one: "Remember me" is a project born from the desire to create a bridge between generations, uniting the past and the future through life stories. We want to create spaces where older people can share their wisdom, experiences, and stories, ensuring that their narratives are not lost over time. Our goal is for these stories not only to endure but also to inspire and teach new generations, strengthening the bond between different ages and cultures.
project.message_part_two: Through "Remember me," we seek to build a collective legacy, where each story is a key piece in creating a more understanding and united world. We believe that by connecting the voices of the past with the hearts of the future, we are sowing the seeds of a more human, empathetic, and purposeful future. This project is more than a platform; it is a movement that celebrates the richness of our stories and the importance of keeping the collective memory alive.
